game.name: Hidden Paws Mystery
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What is this cat doing here? And where are his friends? Explore strange and beautiful islands to find all the little kittens hidden there.
